name: Simple Paint App
description:
IT 201 Final Build for Sprint 1.

In this Simple Paint tool, you are able to draw 3 different shapes onto the canvas.  You can change the shapes size and color to adjust your preference.  All objects are automatically timed to destroy within 3 seconds of spawning but you have the option to turn that off with the toggle switch.  

Have fun. Paint like Picasso and Enjoy!
